projects.title: merchduck website
projects.description: Designed and developed for merchduck. The website utilizes private apis, client side form validation, and accessibility features. You can read about more features on the github repository.

projects.title: this website
projects.description: Built using gatsby.js, hosted on Netlify. The blogs are written in markdown and this page is made with a json!

projects.title: Truth or Dare
projects.description: An Android app built by a team of four students for a CodePath competition. The app posts and gets data from a low-code backend server called Parse.

projects.title: Sunset Generator
projects.description: A visual website that sets a beach scene based on your location using the weather api.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: A calculator that runs inside the browser
